glsa.title: libfpx: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in libfpx that allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: A library for manipulating FlashPIX images.

description.p: A double free vulnerability has been discovered in the Free_All_Memory function in jpeg/dectile.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted FPX image using an application linked against libfpx, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libfpx users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying these packages.
